title: Warawanakute Ii noni
sinopse:
"It's okay even if it hurts... please do me to the very end...!" pleaded Adachi to Tachibana. The feeling of being wanted by Adachi, a guy who was extremely popular with both men and women, gave Tachibana a feeling of superiority as they did it. Tachibana gradually fell for Adachi, but to the contrary, Adachi begins to distance himself from Tachibana...

(Source: B-Comi, translated)
